CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Status) = 'Pending Client Info/Action' || Restore_Pause_Time__c <> "", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT9", "Grey"), IF(((Scheduled_Restore_Time__c - NOW()) * 24) / Hours_to_Restore_SLA__c <= 0,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTB", "Red"), IF(((Scheduled_Restore_Time__c - NOW()) * 24) / Hours_to_Restore_SLA__c > 0.50,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT8", "Green"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTA", "Yellow"))))
CustomField.label: Restore Color Field
